author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
When you think of big game studios like EA you don't really think of open source but every once in a while they surprise me and do something actually good and in this case EA went and open sourced some of the older Command & Conquer titles

title: Early Command & Conquer Goes Open Source GPLv3
